CustomField.description: [Denodo] Check if an Order Line Item is closed
CustomField.formula: IF ( CASE (SPO_FirmOrderStatus__c, 'Cancelled by production', "true", 'Cancelled by store', "true", 'Closed', "true", 'Product delivered to client', "true", 'Sent to MyPR', "true", "false" ) = "true", true, false )
CustomField.label: Is Closed
